notesStmt.note: A note relating to a confiscation and subsequent return of the manuscript to Scuola Pugliesa, a synagogue on Corfu belonging to the Apulian community: dated 1772 (folio 1r). Yosef ben Avraham Boleli: inscribed (folio 246v).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The second part of Sefer mitsṿot gadol of Moses ben Jacob of Coucy.

msItem.title: Sefer mitsṿot gadol ספר מצוות גדול

collation.p: Currently 21 quires of 16 leaves each, followed by a single leaf at the end. A complete quire appears to be missing at the beginning.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Byzantine square and semi-cursive script of the 14th century. Mosheh: marked off in an acrostic, folio 336v.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Moses of Coucy. Sefer Misvoth Gadhol. A.D. 1390. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1081.'
